original_text: And Pharaoh said unto Joseph, I have dreamed a dream, and there is none that can interpret it: and I have heard say of thee, that thou canst understand a dream to interpret it.
korean_text: 바로가 요셉에게 이르되 내가 한 꿈을 꾸었으나 그것을 해석하는 자가 없더니 들은즉 너는 꿈을 들으면 능히 푼다 하더라

sentences.original_text: and there is none that can interpret it
and I have heard say of thee
that thou canst understand a dream to interpret it
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 꿈을 해석할 줄 안다 하더라
